text: Andreas Norland (9 May 1935 – 21 August 2021) was a Norwegian newspaper editor. He was known as editor of three large newspapers Adresseavisen, Verdens Gang and Aftenposten. He was born in Bærum, Norway. Norland died on 21 August 2021, aged 86. ==Selected works== * ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Editors
title: Andreas Norland
